news.title: We earn £60,000 and want a bigger house - stamp duty should be scrapped
news.summary: BBC News hears from people with a range of incomes about what they want to see in the Budget.

news.title: Adolescence lasts into 30s - new study shows four pivotal ages for your brain
news.summary: Brain scans on thousands of people reveal the dramatic shifts the brain goes through between birth and death.

news.title: Ukraine calls for Trump-Zelensky meeting in US this week
news.summary: It comes as US and Russian officials are set to hold talks in Abu Dhabi.

news.title: Graham Linehan cleared of harassing trans activist but guilty of damaging phone
news.summary: Comedy writer Graham Linehan "deliberately whacked" a teenage trans woman's phone out of her hand, a court heard.

news.title: Scammers hacked her phone and stole thousands - so how did they get her details?
news.summary: Sue Shore told the BBC how scammers targeted her - and we found her information had been leaked online.

news.title: 'I didn't start it, Miss': Starmer sorry for leading pupils in 6-7 dance banned by school
news.summary: The prime minister performed a version of the viral dance with primary school children, before being told it was not allowed.

news.title: How to make sure you're getting a good deal on Black Friday
news.summary: Discounts often aren't the cheapest prices, but here's how to make sure you're getting a good deal.

news.title: Heathrow's £49bn plan for longer third runway chosen by government
news.summary: Under the selected plan, the runway would be up to 3.5km long and require a new road tunnel under the airport.

news.title: BBC may not be in 'safe hands' under its chair, says committee head
news.summary: The most senior MP on the culture select committee says Samir Shah's evidence to MPs was "wishy-washy".

news.title: Details of inquiry into teen's body found in singer D4vd's car to be kept from public
news.summary: The medical examiner's office says no details about the 15-year-old's death can be released or posted on its website.
